title: When I start a game of LOL my internet stops working.
body:
Hello,

As the title say when i try to play League my internet stops and when i leave the game its starts working again(or i need to restart my router) this happens only when i play League.(SORRy for bad english)

replies.body:
That's really interesting, and I've very rarely seen this issue pop up here on the boards. In a lot of cases when I see this, the issue is caused by problems with the modem or router that your PC is connected to. I'm curious what specific network hardware you're running (model numbers) and if any other devices on your network lose their network connectivity when this happens to your main PC.

Let me know, thanks!

Hello,

I can see the number of my modem but its TP-Link with one antena (10 years old) i have a friend in the same network zone he has the same problem i have it for an mounth and a half he has it for a week now every device loses connection not only my laptop.
Interesting. If your friend is on the same Network Provider, it may be an issue on that end. Have you reached out to your ISP about this to see if they could test your modem and the issue for you?
Its not the router i tested another router and its the same.

Based on the issue you made another post about and this one, I'd say it's apparent there are some issues with your connection to the servers. If your premade friends are on a similar or the same ISP, there may be issues with the ISP infrastructure that are causing the issue.

I'd like you to first ensure your local settings are good by going through the steps in the connection guide I previously sent you. Let me know the results.

I'm kinda dumb and cant do those thing i downloaded something called Hextech repair tool didnt see anything happening (i updated my java that was in one of the things to do and noting happend),sorry for bad english,
What specific issues are you having when going through the steps inside the [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)?
I don't know what step to do becouse it has the firewall problem that i dont have and others i just don't know what steps to follow.
I recommend going through all the steps, then let me know if any of those steps caused a change in your problem.

I tryed them all but nothing happened and i think it could be from my internet provider (i called them and i'm waiting 5 days now no one came) I'll change my provider (i have a friend, when i go to his place we play together and i get 39 ms stable i change to his) Thanks and sorry for the worryes.
